product_name: Nykaa Naturals Skin Secrets Exotic Indulgence Sheet Mask
description: A revitalizing sheet mask designed to nourish and hydrate your skin. Packed with natural ingredients, it provides an instant glow and is perfect for a quick skin pampering session.

product_name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution
description: A professional-grade peeling solution that targets blemishes and uneven skin tone. With a potent combination of AHA and BHA, it exfoliates deeply to reveal radiant, smooth skin.

product_name: Nykaa Clay It Cool Perfect Glow Clay Mask with Kojic Acid
description: A clay mask enriched with kojic acid to brighten and rejuvenate the skin. It helps to reduce dark spots and leaves your face with a flawless, radiant glow.

product_name: Pilgrim 25% AHA 2% BHA 5% PHA Face Peeling Solution
description: An advanced chemical exfoliant featuring a powerful mix of AHA, BHA, and PHA. Ideal for acne-prone and dull skin, it promotes cell turnover for a smoother, brighter complexion.

product_name: Dot & Key Anti-Acne Salicylic Green Clay Face Mask
description: A detoxifying clay mask infused with salicylic acid to combat acne and unclog pores. Its soothing formula helps reduce redness and prevents breakouts, giving you clear, healthy skin.
